page.title: 05The changing landscape.
page.content: In the northeastern part of Uckfield land previously forming a part of Hempstead Farm Stud is soon to be developed as a housing estate comprising 400 2,3,& 4 bedroomed houses.As this new development will practically join the already existing Manor Park estate,as well as using their access road ,many of the local residents we spoke to were against this new development. A number of the older people were saddened by the fact that they would no longer be surrounded by farm and woodland.Many parents living on Manor Park estate were concerned about the increase in traffic the new estate would bring to the one existing access road. In general most of the people we spoke to felt Uckfield was big enough.
